overview: Arthur and Rafael are boyfriends. After 5 years of relationship and a betrayal by Arthur, the two are breaking up. Arthur discovers that he may have contracted the HIV virus when he betrayed Rafael. While Rafael suffers from the end of the relationship, Arthur will enjoy his single life and be with other men. With the help of Wesley, a mutual friend, the two get together to discuss the future of the relationship and try to reconcile.
title: Posso Te Beijar?
